entry.title: Django DB Connection and Transaction Management
entry.summary:
Description

In this session, we explore Django's database connection and transaction management system. We will discuss how to optimize database performance and handle transactions efficiently in Django applications. This session is designed for developers working with Django who want to deepen their understanding of database interactions and transactions.

Myeongsegyo Hello â€¦
entry.content:
Description

In this session, we explore Django's database connection and transaction management system. We will discuss how to optimize database performance and handle transactions efficiently in Django applications. This session is designed for developers working with Django who want to deepen their understanding of database interactions and transactions.

Myeongsegyo Hello! I am a Django enthusiast with a focus on backend development. I have experience working with databases and optimizing Django applications. I look forward to sharing insights into database connections and transaction management in Django.
